replies.body:
The Cheifs are on {{item:3751}} 
Hopefully they win the grandy as well, I want nothing more then for Raydere to chop up internationally!

> [{quoted}](name=Exhausted,realm=OCE,application-id=ATM3HYki,discussion-id=04G2v458,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-07-21T03:10:53.836+0000)
>
> same mate

Even more glad now that we have a cinema over here in W/A that's screening the final! <3

I'm really glad we were able to get the cinema viewings off the ground around the region. If they're popular, we'll look to expand in the future. Oh, and the other day we did a screen/sound test. Hooooooooly S it was awesome!

you lucky bugger! 

i'll be watching from my lounge, with popcorn.
Haha! I'll save you some movie popcorn! {{summoner:3}}ed xD
